full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Reference Number:** PW-23-01029468
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Solicitation Number:** CRC20230322
* **Publication Date:** 2023-03-08
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2023-03-22T14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Solicitation Description

Industry and Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) is inviting proposals for the supply of various 40 GHz sounder cables. The solicitation is issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC, and all terms and conditions of the SA apply.

**Key Deliverables:**

* 40 GHz sounder cables with technical specifications, as outlined in the specification at Annex “A”: 9.15M, 14.021M, 1.829M, and 0.6M in length.
* Delivery of the products by May 10, 2023.

## Evaluation Criteria

* Technical compliance to the requirement presented herein and at Annex “A”.
* Technical compliance of equivalent (substitute) product(s) offered.
* Total Evaluated Bid Price is the sum of all items at Annex “A”.

## Notice of Expiration

The tender is now expired and no longer accepting proposals.

**View the Solicitation Documents**

The solicitation documents can be viewed on the Canada Buys Website:

* **English:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/08/118631e7b0f665333f4568d0c26f3440/npp20230322_annexb_english.pdf
* **French:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/08/3646c46402a7c9807ccc3e849408e543/npp20230322_annexb_francais.pdf

For any inquires, please contact Samantha Amadio, Contracting Officer at samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca.
